path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Techrate/Disco Burn Token Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fees
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify tax and liquidity fees.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can include/exclude from maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include or exclude certain addresses from the maximum transaction amount, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain entities or transactions from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the minimum token requirement for adding liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change charity, utility, development and donation address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify charity, utility, development, and donation addresses, which could lead to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the privilege to withdraw contract BNBs without any restrictions.

findings.title: Owner Privilege: Modification of Addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change marketing, burnParty, and dev addresses, which can lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.
